trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Define un objeto de tiempo de diseño que se usan para compilar gramáticas en tiempo de ejecución fuertemente tipadas que cumplen con la [especificación de gramática de reconocimiento de voz (SRGS) versión 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Puede construir vacío <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancia y generar una gramática agregando instancias de clases que representan elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: También se puede construir un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancia a partir de un archivo de gramática XML compatible con SRGS existente, de una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o de una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Después de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> se crea el objeto, se puede cargar en una <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto o compilado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, lo que le permite leer un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vea [crear gramáticas utilizando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) en el [Guía de programación de la voz del sistema de .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obtener más información y ejemplos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the constructors for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class, you can create an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, from a string that contains the path to an XML-format grammar, or you can initiate a blank instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando los constructores para la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> (clase), puede crear una instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> desde una <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> de un objeto, de una cadena que contiene la ruta de acceso a una gramática XML con formato, o puede iniciar una instancia en blanco de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor crea vacío <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancia.

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para generar una gramática en vacío <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de la instancia, agregue instancias de clases que representan elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, y <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto y, a continuación, crea una regla pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> que consta de la cadena "es un país que ha ganado la partida la Copa del mundo:" y agrega este elemento para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propiedad de la regla.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo crea dos o más reglas (`ruleEurope` y `ruleSAmerica`), cada una de que es un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto que contiene tres <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Después de eso, otro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> se crea el objeto que contiene <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objetos que hacen referencia a `ruleEurope` y `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> , a continuación, se agrega el objeto a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propiedad de `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Después de esto, todas las reglas de tres (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, y `ruleSAmerica`) se agregan a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propiedad de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the three rules are compiled into a binary representation of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Por último, las tres reglas se compilan en una representación binaria de la gramática.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object used to create the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> utilizado para crear la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example builds a grammar in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente genera una gramática un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instancia mediante <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objetos.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> desde el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="builder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="builder" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="root rule" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="root rule" /> del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class and specifies an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> y especifica que un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> sea la regla raíz de la gramática.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor agrega la regla especificada para la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto y lo establece como el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> regla para la gramática.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two rules (`chooseCities` and `destCities`) for choosing origin and destination cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se crea dos reglas (`chooseCities` y `destCities`) para elegir ciudades de origen y destino de un vuelo.

trans-unit.source: The example initializes the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the `chooseCities` rule as an argument.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se inicializa el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instancia mediante el `chooseCities` regla como argumento.

trans-unit.source: The example writes the contents of the rules collection and the name of the root rule to the console.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se escribe el contenido de la colección de reglas y el nombre de la regla de raíz en la consola.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación del archivo XML del elemento SRGS.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> que especifica la ubicación del documento XML que se utiliza para completar la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the file named "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un nuevo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> desde el archivo denominado "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> es una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that was created with the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> creado con la instancia XML de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> de una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> que hace referencia a un archivo de gramática de formato XML.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references the file "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea una nueva instancia de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> desde una instancia de <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> que hace referencia al archivo "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información de referencia de ensamblado de la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> devuelve una colección de cadenas que contiene una lista de las referencias de ensamblado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la información de código subyacente para la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> devuelve una colección de cadenas que contiene una lista de documentos de código subyacente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la información de referencia cultural de la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that contains the current culture information for <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que contiene la información de la referencia cultural actual para <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows y la API de System.Speech Aceptar todos los códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para realizar el reconocimiento de voz con el idioma especificado en el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> propiedad, un motor de reconocimiento de voz que admite que se debe instalar el código de país de lenguaje.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Los motores de reconocimiento de voz que se incluye con Microsoft Windows 7 trabajar con los siguientes códigos de país de lenguaje.

trans-unit.source: en-GB.
trans-unit.target: en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom)
trans-unit.target: Inglés (Reino Unido)

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: Inglés (Estados Unidos)

trans-unit.source: de-DE.
trans-unit.target: de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany)
trans-unit.target: Alemán (Alemania)

trans-unit.source: es-ES.
trans-unit.target: ES-es.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain)
trans-unit.target: Español (España)

trans-unit.source: fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France)
trans-unit.target: Francés (Francia)

trans-unit.source: ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan)
trans-unit.target: Japonés (Japón)

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: Chino (China)

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: Chino (Taiwán)

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma de dos letras como "es-es", "fr" o "es" también se permiten.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor que se asigna a <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor que se asigna a <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> es <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece si los números de línea se deben agregar a los scripts insertados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> property returns <see langword="true" /> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> devuelve <see langword="true" /> si los números de línea se deben agregar para fines de depuración; si no la propiedad devuelve <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el espacio de nombres relacionados de la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> devuelve una colección de cadenas que contiene una lista de los espacios de nombres relacionados en la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el lenguaje de programación usado para el código insertado en la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> property returns the programming language to which <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> devuelve el lenguaje de programación al que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> está actualmente establecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el modo de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: El modo de reconocimiento de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> propiedad devuelve un miembro de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> que determina el tipo de entrada que el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> espera.

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: Los dos valores posibles son `Voice` para la entrada de voz, y `Dtmf` para la entrada de tonos de frecuencia múltiple de tono dual (DTMF) que están comúnmente asociadas con un teléfono.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el espacio de nombres de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> property returns the namespace for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> devuelve el espacio de nombres para la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el alfabeto fonético de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el alfabeto fonético que se debe usar para especificar pronunciaciones personalizadas en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Fonético alfabetos se componen de teléfonos, que constan de letras, números o caracteres, a veces en combinación.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada teléfono describe un sonido único de la oración.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Esto difiere del alfabeto latino, para que cualquier letra puede representar varios sonidos orales.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta las pronunciaciones diferentes de la letra "c" en las palabras "golosinas" y "cese" o las pronunciaciones diferentes de la combinación de letras "th" en palabras "lo" y "los".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: En System.Speech, puede utilizar cualquiera de los tres alfabetos fonético para especificar las pronunciaciones personalizadas: alfabeto de teléfono internacional (IPA), establecer teléfono Universal (UPS) o el SAPI phone conjunto.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: El alfabeto fonético especificado determina qué conjunto de teléfono se utilizará para definir las pronunciaciones en línea para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Los teléfonos especificados en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> debe coincidir con el alfabeto fonético especificado en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vea [léxicos y alfabetos fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obtener más información.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la regla raíz de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la regla designada como regla raíz de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto ya debe estar en el documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> antes de que se puede establecer en el **regla raíz**.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: También puede establecer la regla de raíz para un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto mediante el uso de un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto como argumento para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a rule named `winnerRule`, and then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object named `document`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea una regla denominada `winnerRule`y, a continuación, se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto denominado `document`.

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method to add the rule to the document.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo, a continuación, se llama el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método para agregar la regla para el documento.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example sets the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> property to `winnerRule`, thereby making it the `root rule` for the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Por último, en el ejemplo se establece el documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> propiedad `winnerRule`, con lo que se lo que el `root rule` para la gramática definida por el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de reglas definidas actualmente para la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve las reglas definidas para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede agregar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objetos a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método en el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Si inicializa un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto y especifique un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto como argumento, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> se agrega automáticamente a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea una gramática que reconoce la frase "son de un país que ha ganado la partida la Copa del mundo" seguido del nombre de un país que ha ganado la partida la Copa del mundo.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto y, a continuación, crea una regla pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After adding a string to the rule `winnerRule`, the example creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each containing a list of countries.
trans-unit.target: Después de agregar una cadena a la regla `winnerRule`, el ejemplo crea dos o más reglas (`ruleEurope` y `ruleSAmerica`), cada una contiene una lista de países.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method, the example adds all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método, el ejemplo agrega tres todas las reglas (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, y `ruleSAmerica`) a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el lenguaje de scripting de .NET Framework para la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Script" /> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad <see langword="Script" /> devuelve el lenguaje de scripting actual de .NET para la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This property has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad está en desuso.

trans-unit.source: Its use is no longer recommended.
trans-unit.target: Ya no se recomienda su uso.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to null.
trans-unit.target: Se intentó establecer la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> en null.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Se intentó establecer la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> en una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to write the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> que se utiliza para escribir la instancia <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Escribe el contenido del objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> en un archivo de gramática de formato XML que se ajusta a la [especificación de gramática de reconocimiento de voz (SRGS) versión 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto y, a continuación, crea una regla pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> que consta de la cadena "es un país que ha ganado la partida la Copa del mundo:" y agrega este elemento para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propiedad de la regla.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo crea dos o más reglas (`ruleEurope` y `ruleSAmerica`), cada una de que es un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto que contiene tres <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Después de eso, otro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> se crea el objeto que contiene <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objetos que hacen referencia a `ruleEurope` y `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> , a continuación, se agrega el objeto a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propiedad de `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Después de esto, todas las reglas de tres (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, y `ruleSAmerica`) se agregan a la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example creates an empty XML file and an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Por último, en el ejemplo se crea un archivo XML vacío y una instancia de <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance to write the contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> to the XML file.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> método usa la <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instancia para escribir el contenido de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> en el archivo XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el URI base de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: El identificador URI base actual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> propiedad obtiene un valor que se utiliza para resolver los URI relativos en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Suponga que el valor de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> es "http://www.contoso.com/" y la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contiene una referencia de las reglas relativas a otro documento, por ejemplo `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Esto crea la siguiente ruta de acceso absoluta al documento externo: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
